channel.title: English on Long Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in English on Long Thoughts

item.title: Tinder Manifesto
item.author: felix.brilej@googlemail.com (Felix Brilej)
item.description:
Manifesto: noun. A public declaration of policy and aims, especially one issued before an election by a political party or candidate.

Tinder could get dirty. Tinder could get tedious. I wrote down my original aims when I started using tinder here, before everything falls into chaos later. Much like with other manifestos ;)

item.title: What do we know about who we want to be?
item.author: felix.brilej@googlemail.com (Felix Brilej)
item.description: It is pretty important for each of us to be the person we want to be. For survival, for society, for integrity. But what do we know then about who we want to be?

item.title: The three most important skills to have as a young adult
item.author: felix.brilej@googlemail.com (Felix Brilej)
item.description:
TL;DR:

  • The skill to change your habits, so you could start trying new ones (better or worse than your current ones) to begin with.
  • The skill to build the desire of trying things truly out of your comfort zone, so you could expand your horizon and thereby change more of your habits.
  • The skill of writing, so you could articulate what it is that you want. Also writing can be a great tool for changing your habits.
